messages.title: OUR TOOTING CANDIDATE
messages.content: I have lived in Tooting for 9 years and teach chemistry in a secondary school. I am passionate about young people and their important role in our community. We must ensure our society gives young people a fair start in life, so I stand by the Green Party's living wage policy. I also care deeply about the NHS. St George's is an excellent hospital; we must reverse the privatisation of the NHS and ensure people come before profit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocating for a fair start in life by supporting the Green Party's living wage policy.
Opposing privatization of the NHS and prioritizing people over profit.

issues.economy: Living wage policy to give young people a fair start in life.
issues.education: Passionate about the role of young people in the community.
issues.health: Oppose NHS privatisation, ensuring people come before profit.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Tooting for 9 years and teach chemistry in a secondary school. I am passionate about young people and their important role in our community.

politicalExperience.achievements: Teaching and advocating for young people in the community.
